name: SAVADECK A7L Carbon Road Bike, T800 Carbon Fiber Frame 700C Racing Bicycle with Shimano 105 R7100 24 Speed Groupset and Hydraulic Disc Brake, Ultra-Light Carbon Bike for Man and Women
short_description: 【Lightweight Material】: The T800 carbon fiber frame, along with the carbon fork and seatpost, carbon fiber rims absorbs vibrations while reducing the overall weight to just 8.9 kg (19.6lbs). This combination of strength and durability enhances the bike's longevity, making it a reliable choice for any rider

【Fully Internal Cable Design】: This road bike features a fully integrated internal cable routing system for smooth, clean airflow. The tapered head tube enhances torsional stiffness, providing excellent handling and stability for a superior riding experience

【700x25C Carbon Wheelsets】: This lightweight road bike features 700x25C tires, perfect for various road conditions. The anti-skid design on both sides enhances grip, giving you confidence when cornering at high speeds. Plus, enjoy a complimentary pair of clipless pedals with your purchase!

【Powerful Hydraulic Disc Brakes】: Experience exceptional braking performance with hydraulic disc brakes that offer strong stopping power and short braking distances. Enjoy the confidence to tackle any situation with precision and control

【Aerodynamic Design】: This bike is meticulously crafted for optimal aerodynamics, with the frame, wheelset, and handlebars designed to minimize drag. This sleek design enhances both visual appeal and performance, making it the ideal choice for cyclists seeking a perfect blend of style and speed

name: SAVADECK Carbon Gravel Bike - T800 Carbon Frame & Fork, Shimano GRX400 20-Speed Groupset, Hydraulic Disc Brakes, 700C x 40mm Tires - Lightweight Design for Road & Off-Road Adventures

【Powerful Hydraulic Disc Brakes & Sleek Internal Routing】Featuring Shimano RX400 hydraulic disc brakes, this bike delivers exceptional stopping power and reliable control in all conditions. The internal cable routing not only protects cables but also enhances the bike’s sleek, modern design

【All-Terrain Capability for Any Adventure】Designed with 700x40c tires and durable 45-spoke rims, this bike provides superior stability and traction on rough terrains. The Shimano RX600 crankset ensures lightweight construction, efficient power transfer, and durability for smooth rides on or off the road

【Ergonomic Design for Comfort & Performance】With a comfortable upright frame, fully internal cable routing for improved aerodynamics, and a tapered head tube for enhanced torsional rigidity, this bike offers superior handling, stability, and comfort for long-distance rides and adventurous explorations
